name: Bermuda Dunes Country Club
description: Established in 1958, Bermuda Dunes Country Club is a prestigious gated community renowned for its classic golf course, which has hosted the Bob Hope Classic numerous times. The community offers a diverse range of residences, from custom estates to stylish condominiums, all set amidst lush fairways and mature landscaping. Residents enjoy amenities such as tennis courts, a clubhouse, and a vibrant social scene, embodying the quintessential desert lifestyle.
keywords: Bermuda Dunes Country Club homes for sale
Living in Bermuda Dunes Country Club

name: Bellissimo at Bermuda Dunes Country Club
description: Bellissimo is an exclusive enclave within the Bermuda Dunes Country Club, featuring approximately 52 homes built between 2002 and 2004. These residences range from 1,744 to 2,607 square feet, offering 2 to 4 bedrooms. The community is known for its elegant architecture, well-maintained landscapes, and access to the country club's amenities, providing a luxurious and comfortable living experience.

name: Montego West
description: Montego West is a distinguished condominium community within Bermuda Dunes Country Club, offering spacious units with panoramic mountain and golf course views. Residents enjoy access to community pools, tennis courts, and the club's amenities, all within a serene and well-manicured environment.
keywords: Living in Montego West Bermuda Dunes

name: Volaré
description: Volaré is an exclusive gated community featuring 18 modern single-story homes ranging from 1,738 to 2,406 square feet, with 3 to 4 bedrooms and private pools and spas. Conveniently located near premier entertainment and sporting events, Volaré offers luxurious desert living with breathtaking views and expansive elevated lots that promise utmost privacy.

name: Yorkville
description: Yorkville is a tranquil community within Bermuda Dunes offering single-family homes with spacious lots. Known for its peaceful streets and proximity to Bermuda Dunes Country Club, it’s an ideal choice for families and professionals alike.

name: BDCC Villas
description: BDCC Villas offers a collection of stylish townhomes and condos within Bermuda Dunes Country Club. Residents enjoy golf course views, community pools, and a vibrant social atmosphere.
keywords: Living in BDCC Villas Bermuda Dunes

name: Bellissimo
description: Bellissimo is a boutique, gated community featuring custom-built homes with modern designs and private pools. Its intimate setting and scenic surroundings make it a highly desirable address.

name: Desert Homes
description: Desert Homes is a family-friendly neighborhood offering affordable single-family homes with large yards. Residents appreciate its proximity to schools, parks, and shopping centers.

name: Country Club Estates
description: Country Club Estates is an upscale enclave within Bermuda Dunes offering luxurious custom homes with spacious layouts and stunning golf course views.

name: Vista Montana
description: Vista Montana is a gated, 55+ community offering manufactured homes with access to a clubhouse, fitness center, and social activities. It’s perfect for active adults seeking affordability and convenience.
